items.text: ends the over with a short ball that Mithun pulls nicely while getting on top of it, deep midwicket goes to his left and slides to keep it to two
fullish outside off, driven away nicely into the covers
items.postText: Mashid: "Though it's very poor cricket by Bangladesh but I see a silver lining where the youngsters are playing well compared to the stalwart for this game. And if this trends stays, this would lay foundation for overseas victories for Bangladesh in the future." Long-term planning

items.text: slower at 116.5kmh and back of length outside off, Mithun waits before guiding it late and fine on the off side and wants two
back to 132kmh now and on good length on off, defended back this time
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: bit short and wide, he slashes but doesn't middle it this time and finds point
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: much closer to off and tighter length, Mithun steers it to point where a dive saves the single
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: errs down the leg side past the pads for a wide
length ball, on off stump, no room and he defends it back
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: slightly short outside off with some room and he finds point
items.shortText: Boult to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: dances down to smash the short ball with a horizontal bat but it bounces over him. Big swing and a miss
items.shortText: Boult to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: full on the off stump this time and it's clipped with the wrists to mid-on
items.shortText: Boult to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: a single finally as Boult pitches this one towards the pads with a full length and Saifuddin helps it to fine leg

almost a run-out as Mithun drives it to cover and wants a run, but Neesham dives full length to his right to snare the ball. Has a shy at the stumps at the keeper's end with Mithun still well outside, but he misses. They get an overthrow
ends the over with a yorker, he jams his bat down to block it
items.shortText: Boult to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: on length on the off side and he steers it just wide of point for a quick single
135kmh, some room outside off, he goes for a bit shot on the leg side but doesn't middle and finds mid-on
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: tighter line on off stump, he waits this time and steers it straight to point
items.postText: Md Imran Khan: "A little bit sensible batting from the top order, they could have easily scored 250+"
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: that looked like a cutter on the off stump, Saifuddin tried to clip it to leg but couldn't time it properly. Scrambled seam, actually
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: just a bit too short now and he pulls for a single
slow offcutter around off, he waits before punching it square but point dives to his left to save a few
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: edged and that just goes over Latham's gloves, it actually hit Latham's left glove. A short ball from Henry took the outside edge and Latham went for the jump but the bounce made sure it didn't land in his gloves
fuller this time and Saifuddin slams it down wide of mid-on, but he dives to his left and NZ save some runs again
makes a lot of room and Henry chases him with what would have been a leg-side delivery, and Saifuddin cuts it wide of point for one

short of length delivery outside off, he defends and reaches his fifty with an inside edge to the leg side. His third half-century in ODIs, and first outside Asia. He's not far from his high sore of 63
